WorkItem.Description: The goal of TypeScript is to make JavaScript statically typed. Therefore, make statement complation work like in any other stronlgy typed language in .NET. Allow committing using these symbols '{}[]().,:;+-*/%&|^!~=<>?@#'"\'.
WorkItem.Summary: Statement complation can be comitted only using Tab or Enter

Comments.Message:
Hi BlueCode,

Thank you for your suggestion!  We have added this request for a future version of the TypeScript Playground.

Regards,
Fiona
